channel.description: Understand SAML Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 479 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update the flow charts away from Plant UML to use the Figma design. Links to original docs: SAML: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/saml/ Page type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview

item.title: Service provider Initiated flow
item.description: Service Provider Initiated Flow Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 516 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: There are two types of flow and this doc describes the SP version. For details on the IdP-initiated flow see: https://workos.com/blog/sp-initiated-sso-vs-idp-authentication Changes to be made: Change the title to Service provider initiated flow.
